list.name: FLOOR-IS-FINE
list.description: Berry gains x% increased reload speed when standing on his own melted ice cream.
list.descriptionHtml: Berry gains x% increased reload speed when standing on his own melted ice cream.

list.name: MAKING-A-MESS
list.description: Berry's basic attack gains x% extra damage on impact in areas with no ice cream.
list.descriptionHtml: Berry's basic attack gains x% extra damage on impact in areas with no ice cream.
